messages.details: Data Format Descriptor is mandatory but dfdByteOffset is 0 and dfdByteLength is 92.
dfdByteOffset is 0 but the Data Format Descriptor must immediately follow (with 4 byte alignment) the Level Index so it must be 104.

messages.message: Mismatching dfdTotalSize and dfdByteLength. dfdTotalSize must match dfdByteLength
messages.details: dfdTotalSize is 92 but dfdByteLength is 1481919403 and they must match.
